meanings.sent1: The book was so storyless that I couldn't follow along.
meanings.sent2: The movie had a storyless plot that left me confused.
meanings.sent3: The play was so storyless, it felt like a jumbled mess of scenes.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation was as storyless as a blank page.
meanings.sent5: The painting was completely storyless, just colors on canvas.

meanings.sent1: The storyless book had no clear beginning, middle, or end.
meanings.sent2: The movie felt storyless, jumping from scene to scene without coherence.
meanings.sent3: The party was so storyless, it felt like a random gathering of people.
meanings.sent4: His speech was as storyless as a silent movie.
meanings.sent5: The game was completely storyless, just moving pieces around aimlessly.
